name: Iron Commando - Koutetsu no Senshi
description: Take control of either Jake, a soldier, or Chang Li, a martial arts master, in your quest to stop G.H.O.S.T.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I love this kind of beat 'em up games, like Street of Rage and Cadillacs and Dinossaurs.
